column1: 1. Nothing is found in this world without hard work.
3. Don't look at the day in terms of what you found, but think of what you smelled today
4. Don't be afraid of failure, but be afraid of not trying.
5. Life is a constant test, here after falling down ten times, getting up eleven times is success
6. Hope for light but don't live on hope
7. Hazrat Ali said: Always speak the truth so that you never have to swear
8. Your attitude can change your life
9. The education within which he entered. He adopts simplicity - and that which would pass over. He becomes modern
10. Work so quietly that May your success make noise!!
